heroIntroduction: I create functional web applications focused in performance, aesthetics, and efficiency, keeping the code clean and easy to maintain.

tasks: I collaborate in the development of an application for team vacation management, using React for the user interface.
I modify and customize emails, forms, and landing pages using HTML, CSS, and HubSpot's CRM editor.
I developed a REST API using Spring Boot to automate data transfer between HubSpot and an internal application.
I developed the frontend and backend of an internal web application for managing courses, users, and training diplomas, as well as issuing them.
I implemented automated tests for HTTP requests, reducing the possibility of errors and improving code stability.

projects.toolsydeDescription: Toolbox style application based on microservices with a variety of utilities for developers.
projects.mobeliaDescription: Modern furniture e-commerce with responsive design, shopping cart, secure payments, and social authentication.
